Package sh.brane.contract

Class ContractOptions.Builder

java.lang.Object
sh.brane.contract.ContractOptions.Builder
Enclosing class:
ContractOptions
public static final class ContractOptions.Builder extends Object
Builder for creating ContractOptions instances.

      public ContractOptions.Builder gasLimit(long gasLimit)

      this builder

    • timeout

      public ContractOptions.Builder timeout(Duration timeout)
      Sets the timeout for waiting on transaction receipts.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the timeout duration (must be positive)
      Returns:
      this builder
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if timeout is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if timeout is zero or negative

    • pollInterval

      public ContractOptions.Builder pollInterval(Duration pollInterval)
      Sets the polling interval for checking transaction status.
      Parameters:
      pollInterval - the poll interval (must not be null or negative)
      Returns:
      this builder
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if pollInterval is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if pollInterval is negative or zero

    • transactionType

      public ContractOptions.Builder transactionType(ContractOptions.TransactionType transactionType)
      Sets the transaction type for write operations.

      EIP-1559 is recommended for post-London chains as it provides better gas price optimization. Use LEGACY for chains that don't support EIP-1559.

      Parameters:
      transactionType - the transaction type
      Returns:
      this builder
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if transactionType is null

    • maxPriorityFee

      public ContractOptions.Builder maxPriorityFee(Wei maxPriorityFee)
      Sets the max priority fee (miner tip) for EIP-1559 transactions.

      This is only used when transactionType is EIP1559. A reasonable default is 1-2 gwei for mainnet, but may vary by network conditions.

      Parameters:
      maxPriorityFee - the max priority fee
      Returns:
      this builder
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if maxPriorityFee is null

    • build

      public ContractOptions build()
      Builds the ContractOptions instance.
      Returns:
      a new ContractOptions instance
